full_text: FYI - I'm answering the Hill re: NY Daily News article that published on release of IM Matthews From Lee Plourde To [redacted] Date 2019/08/15 15:25 Subject: FYI - I'm answering the Hill re: NY Daily News article that published on release of [redacted] Attachments: TEXT.htm Thank you [redacted] 8/15/2019 3:24 PM >>> You don't need to answer this Hill reporter below (I will). [redacted] Public Information Office Federal Bureau of Prisons (202) 353 [redacted] [redacted] 8/15/2019 3:11 PM >>> [redacted] Story: http://www.nydailynews.com/new-york/ny-inmate-at-mcc-mistakenly-released-after-jeffrey-epstein-suicide-20190815-h2r76qxnfcodp225goyte6y7a-story.html Reporter: [redacted] the Hill Question: My name's [redacted] and I'm a reporter with The Hill. I'm reaching out to see if the BOP has any comment on this report (https://www.nydailynews.com/new-york/ny-inmate-at-mcc-mistakenly-released-after-jeffrey-epstein-suicide-20190815-h2r76qxnfcodp225goyte6y7a-story.html) that convicted bank robber [redacted] as mistakenly released on Aug. 7; he is still listed as "released" in the "find an inmate" portal as of 10:21 on Thursday. Proposed Response: [redacted] Page 6435 DOJ-OGR-00024412

Question: My name's [redacted] and I'm a reporter with The Hill. I'm reaching out to see if the BOP has any comment on this report (https://www.nydailynews.com/new-york/ny-inmate-at-mcc-mistakenly-released-after-jeffrey-epstein-suicide-20190815-h2r76qxnfcodp225goyte6y7a-story.html) that convicted bank robber [redacted] as mistakenly released on Aug. 7; he is still listed as "released" in the "find an inmate" portal as of 10:21 on Thursday.

additional_notes: The document is a redacted email chain discussing a news article about an inmate mistakenly released after Jeffrey Epstein's suicide. Multiple sections are redacted.
